descriptionHtml:
Simply Dark Dragonscale Armour with shield!

Why? because original Dragonscale Armour looks aweful.. still not to keen hence why mine looks like nightingale with a glitchy hood that i\'m yet to fix!

Someone has probably tried to do Dragonscale like this as i\'ve tried installing different ones and didn\'t like them as there was something not quite right.. Hopefully you\'ll enjoy this one :D

To install just extract files in the skyrim folder

Enjoy
author: Reudaisu
